description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into light at will, turning the user into a Light Human.

abilities.description: The user can transform their body into light, making physical attacks phase harmlessly through them.
The user transforms their leg into light and delivers a devastating kick at light speed, powerful enough to topple mangrove trees.
The user can move at the speed of light and transport themselves by means of reflection.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)

keyMoments.title: First Combat Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Kizaru demonstrates the Pika Pika no Mi's intangibility and offensive power by phasing through bullets and destroying a mangrove with a light-speed kick.

reveals.information: User can become intangible light and phase through attacks
User can deliver light-speed kicks with devastating power

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and manipulate straw at will, with the straw having damage-redirecting properties.

abilities.description: The user creates straw voodoo dolls that redirect any physical damage inflicted upon them to other people connected to the dolls. Can hold up to 10 dolls at once.
The user can generate and control straw at will, using it to create various constructs and effects.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Limited to 10 damage redirections at once

keyMoments.title: Damage Redirection Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Hawkins uses straw voodoo dolls to redirect Admiral Kizaru's attacks to other people, surviving what would be fatal blows.

culturalReferences.reference: Based on voodoo doll practices from various cultures
culturalReferences.description: The damage redirection ability is inspired by the concept of voodoo dolls that create sympathetic connections between objects and people.

reveals.information: Can redirect damage through straw voodoo dolls
